mapper.sql: p.id, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_image AS productImage, p.product_subtitle AS productSubtitle, p.product_detail AS productDetail, p.product_price AS productPrice, p.product_status AS productStatus, p.product_selling_price AS productSellingPrice, p.product_stock AS productStock, p.product_sale_point AS productSalePoint, p.product_createTime AS productCreateTime, p.product_updateTime AS productUpdateTime, p.category_id AS categoryId
product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.id = c.id
mapper.update: update product set product_status = #{product_status} where product_id = #{product_id}
update category set category_status = #{category_status} where category_id = #{category_id}
mapper.select: select * from product left join category on category.category_id = product.category_id where category_name = #{category_name} limit 3
